user.description: Enter your UniFi Site Manager API key. You can obtain this from https://unifi.ui.com.

reauth_confirm.description: The UniFi Site Manager integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to UniFi Site Manager API

abort.already_configured: Integration already configured for this API key

refresh.name: Refresh data
refresh.description: Forces an immediate refresh of all UniFi Site Manager data.

refresh_type.name: Refresh type
refresh_type.description: Specify which type of data to refresh. If not specified, all data will be refreshed.
